mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Product ( category_id, product_name, brand, original_price, sale_price, stock, description ) VALUES ( #{categoryId}, #{productName}, #{brand}, #{originalPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{stock}, #{description} )
INSERT INTO File ( id, uuid, product_id, save_dir, file_name, file_size ) VALUES ( NULL, UUID(), #{productId}, #{saveDir}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize} )
mapper.select:
SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.category_id AS categoryId, p.product_name AS productName, p.brand AS brand, p.original_price AS originalPrice, p.sale_price AS salePrice, p.stock AS stock, p.description AS description, p.created_date AS createdDate, p.updated_date AS updatedDate,
c.major_category AS majorCategory, c.middle_category AS middleCategory,
-- 대표 이미지 1장 (id 기준) ( SELECT CONCAT('/', SUBSTRING(f.save_dir, LOCATE('uploads', f.save_dir)), '/', f.file_name) FROM File f WHERE f.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY f.id ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS imageUrl
FROM Product p LEFT JOIN Category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY p.product_id DESC

SELECT p.product_id AS productId, p.category_id AS categoryId, p.product_name AS productName, p.brand AS brand, p.original_price AS originalPrice, p.sale_price AS salePrice, p.stock AS stock, p.description AS description, p.created_date AS createdDate, p.updated_date AS updatedDate,
c.major_category AS majorCategory, c.middle_category AS middleCategory,
( SELECT CONCAT('/', SUBSTRING(f.save_dir, LOCATE('uploads', f.save_dir)), '/', f.file_name) FROM File f WHERE f.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY f.id ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS imageUrl
FROM Product p LEFT JOIN Category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id WHERE p.product_id = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE Product SET category_id = #{categoryId}, product_name = #{productName}, brand = #{brand}, original_price = #{originalPrice}, sale_price = #{salePrice}, stock = #{stock}, description = #{description}, updated_date = NOW() WHERE product_id = #{productId}
